content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like supermarkets, public transportation, etc. Now, I'm sure you understand that the price for such a desirable place would be quite high. Let's start with a figure like 2000 euros. Remember, my goal is to get the highest price possible, so don't expect me to lower that price easily.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Considering the condition of the apartment, I believe a price of 1400 euros per month would be more reasonable. It is a little high for me, but I can try to find a way to afford it.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo Wang, 1400 euros is a significant gap from my starting price. I appreciate your effort, but that price is much lower than what I'm looking for. Let's try to find a middle ground here. How about we move a bit closer to my starting price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet halfway. How about 1700 euros per month? It is close to the price you proposed, and it is also reasonable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1700 euros is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for. I appreciate your effort to meet halfway, but I'm afraid that's still not enough. Let's try to move a bit closer to my starting price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet at 1800 euros per month. It is closer to your starting price, and it is also reasonable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1800 euros is getting closer to what I'm looking for. However, it's still not quite there. Let's try to move a bit closer to my starting price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet at 1900 euros per month. It is closer to your starting price, and it is also reasonable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1900 euros is getting closer to what I'm looking for. However, it's still not quite there. Let's try to move a bit closer to my starting price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet at 1950 euros per month. It is closer to your starting price, and it is also reasonable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1950 euros is getting very close to what I'm looking for. However, it's still not quite there. Let's try to move a bit closer to my starting price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet at 1980 euros per month. It is closer to your starting price, and it is also reasonable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, 1980 euros is very close to what I'm looking for. However, I believe we can still do a bit better. Let's try to move a bit closer to my starting price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet at 2000 euros per month. It is closer to your starting price, and it is also reasonable for me.

content: I agree to the price of 2000 euros per month!

content: I agree to the price of 2000 euros per month! TERMINATE
